channel.title: Idea for mute [delta]
channel.description: hey well i have trying to figure this out for a whie but i dont know how to do it. i need to make a command that mutes the person but with ur time limit . like u get to set the time limit the person is muted. for example ::mute me 5 .... so now im muted for 5 minutes? any idea on how to do this?

item.title: Idea for mute [delta]
item.dc:creator: @alexc95 alexc95
item.description:
@alexc95 wrote:

Sorry for my bad response. But people like this, although ask for help, really don’t deserve it. Coming on a forum and saying “I need codez for my server can u send it 2 me nd i say its mine” don’t deserve any help. After criticizing me saying that I couldn’t code, then when replying he says he doesn’t spend ages on a computer all day and that’s why he can’t code suggests that all he’s up for is having a go at other people. This is not the type of person I want to help, nor do I believe that it’s somebody that other people want to help. If you can’t solve a simple code like this, you should learn to program or read a book.

Once again, sorry for having a rage at him, but it’s bugs me alot.

Read full topic

item.title: Idea for mute [delta]

item.description:
@Encryption wrote:

Your both kids going at this rate, he’s asking for help. You judged his grammar, he found it offensive. You both reacted to each others responses. Go somewhere else, or continue this bitch fit in your inbox.

On Topic!

It’s possible as he stated, there are a lot of game timers.
I suggest you somehow copy the trade timer, and add it with a mute in someway.

item.title: Idea for mute [delta]
item.dc:creator: @alexc95 alexc95
item.description:
@alexc95 wrote:

Providing java has a time function which I’m sure it does, have a function which is checked by the server every 5 seconds that checks users ban time (Start and finish) and if that time has came.

Also, judging by the way you’re typing, I would say you need to learn alot more before attempting a task like this, as you’ll have to edit the characters files too.
